title: NRITYARANJANI FINE ARTS ACADEMY
detailsOfAchievement: Dance is a devotion which acclaimed Performer Choreographer Guru and Bharatanatyam danseuse Revathi Srinivasraghavan inherited from her guru Smt. Komalavalli Krishnamani After initial tutelage under her she acquired further knowledge from the renowned Indian nattuvanar Guru Kalaimamani Kadirvelu Pillai She gained deeper insights in Abhinaya from Padma Vibhushan Smt. Kalanidhi Narayanan She gained knowledge of Konnakkol under Guru T. S. Nandakumar and currently continues to learn under Satish Krishnamurthy A Nritya Alankar from Akhil Bharatiya Gandharva Mahavidyalaya Mandal she holds a Masters Degree in Fine Arts from Nagpur University She is the Founder Director of Nrityaranjani Fine Arts Academy a leading institute of Bharatnatyam training in Mumbai since last 25 years. Revathi a versatile dancer incorporates a lot of knowledge into her dance choreographies and hence her performances appeal to diverse audiences. A unique collaboration of Traditional Bharatnatyam with Mridangam has been started by her with multi faceted Mridangam playeri Satish Krishnamurthy. Together they have conceptualized, produced and performed Nritya Laya a unique presentation of Bharatnatyam on Mridangam jathis at coveted platforms such as NCPA Mumbai. Titles conferred : Shiledar Rashtriyanirmitiche- Contributors in Nation Building 2014 by Prasar Bharati- Doordarshan. â€œShivali Nritya Shiromaniâ€ Shivali Cultural Trust, â€œNatya Ratnaâ€ Rasikaranjani Sabha â€œ Nritya Shiromani â€œ Cuttack International DanceFest, â€œNritya Vilasiniâ€ Nrithanrityathi DanceFest, â€œGirnar Ratnaâ€ Girnar Festival. Revathiâ€™s performance displays creativity and freshness in abhinaya and rhythmic nuance Some of her students are scholarshiprecipients of the CCRT Govt of India. Gallery of Performances: Smt Revathi has directed several solo and group Bharatanatyam presentations. Using her knowledge of music, she fuses complicated rhythms and cross rhythms within her dances. Revathi has composed many varied AllarippuJaathis. Her proficiency as a Nattuvanaar is acclaimed across the fine art enthusiasts. Her recent performances include: Experimental Theater, NCPA NRITYA LAYA festival Pamona Temple New York USA Guruvayurappan Temple NJ USA Bridgewater Temple USA BrahanNatyanjali Natyanjali Kumbakonam Natyanjali Tiruvarur Mayura Natyanjali Marudha Natyanjali Natyanjali, Salem Thematic presentation on Rhythm Mulund Fine Arts. Cuttack International DanceFest Karur Natyanjali Festival Smitavach, Pune Girnar Festival, Junagadh Nrithanrithyathi Festival, Bhilai Kalabharthi, Mumbai Ambadevi Temple Vidyavihar, Bombay Ayyappa Seva Sangam, Goregaon, Navarathri Festival Bhagavathi Amman Temple, Pudukode Angamali, Thrisur, Vadakancheri, Mookambika Kerala Bappanadu, Kateel, Mangaladevi Temple, Mangalore. Annual Music and DanceFest,Salem Guruvayur Temple, Kerala Uttar Chidambaram Nataraja Temple, Satara Isai Natya VizhaFest, Chennai ShivaliFest, Mumbai. Vishwabharati, Morrappur SrishtiFest, Bengaluru Aashraya, NaviMumbai GSB Navarathri Cultural Programme, Dahisar Ayyappa Samaj, Vasai DasyamFest, Chennai Dakshina ChitraFest, Chennai Dombivili Fine Arts AnnualFest SriSathya SaiAradhana Mahotsav, Mumbai As a choreographer, Revathi has experimented with a variety of themes and directed several dance ballets like: NrithyaLaya RudraNatyam BhaktiVaibhavam DeviBhakti Ganesha Pancharatnam DruvaCharitam GopikaGeetam Shivastuti Ramayana Rabigeetika ValliTirumanam BhaktaAndal Dashavataram KrishnamVande Jagatgurum Om SharavanaBhava ShivaShakthi KrishnaKrishnaa Shiva Priya The students of Nrityaranjani participate in prestigious festivals, conferences, and competitions and serve society by performing for fundraising events. Revathi is a regular examiner for the Alankar and Visharadh Examination conducted by the Akhil Bharatiya Gandharva Mahavidyalaya Mandala. As a guest lecturer invited by several institutes she has conducted workshops in Bharatanatyam.

title: Om Drishti Trust
detailsOfAchievement: Om Drishti Trust runs the Suraj Eye Institute as a non profit foundation. We work in the area of control of blindness, education, public health and research. We have sustained our work since the Institute started and on a yearly basis about 40-50% of our work has been charitable for the rurala and urban slum communities. We are recognised for DNB in Ophthalmology. We have conducted two public health population based studies titled the Central India Eye and Medical Study and the Central India Childrens Eye Study. We are working in the field of Cataract, Diabetes, paediatric ophthalmology and retinopathy of prematurity for our community outreach. The Institute is a partner and collaborator for the Global Burden of Disease 2013 and 2015. There are now more than 70 publications in peer reviewed international journals. The Om Drishti Trust has now acquired land in Mihan for creating a Centre of Excellence in Eye care to serve the region of Central India. The Institute has excelled in eye research and community outreach and provided exceptional quality of eye care.

detailsOfAchievement: Om Education Society â€œA centre for preserving cultural heritage and developing healthy society with nonconventional educationâ€ Non conventional education system Conventional system of education in schools & colleges transfers knowledge however, the virtues and aims in personal life like stability of mind, self confidence, boldness are not assimilated. Shri Narendranath Maharaj states â€œNon conventional education system means to assimilate the virtues of great human beingsâ€ Today Hanuman, Ganesh, Shankar, Dattatraya are considered as Gods, but none of them claimed themselves as God. Since their qualities and capacities experienced by people were extraordinary, people recognized them as God rather than great human leaders. The education as to, how to assimilate virtues of great human beings, human incarnations from their life sketch, and how to create and assimilate the virtues one is interested in, to build our own personality, forms the scope of non conventional education Shri Nath Shakti Peeth In todayâ€™s world there is degradation of human values and increase in the materialistic enjoyment. The words faith, love, duty & trust have become meaningless and fear has developed in the mind of truthful person having good character. The spiritual lifestyle is essential to change these circumstances. Spirituality doesnâ€™t mean worship of God but it means to make the man truthful by thoughts and action and to create duty bound, fearless, powerful personality, having human values and good character. We are working on this since last 24 years. Propagation of Vedic Knowledge & Research The whole Universe is created from Vedas. Vedas are the basic science. Each and every mantra from veda has been studied for numerous years and had been tried and tested by â€œRishimuniesâ€. They have explained emphatically the results of every mantra. The Vedic Knowledge, Principles, Mantra and Tantra can be used for overcoming all difficulties faced by human beings, increasing working capacities and efficiencies, as also the abilities and to achieve the objectives of life. We are conducting Researches, experiments and studies regarding Vedas and its uses to society. Pralhad Ashram Chaturved Path Shala provides complete Vedic education totally free. With ancient Gurukul pattern of delivering education students of age 7 to 12 years are admitted for the courses. Vedic Treatment Every human being is devoured with problems. His efforts to overcome problems go in vain as he fails to understand the analytical reasoning behind those problems. We treat all such problems with a success rate of more than 90%, with the help of designed Vedic procedures, spiritual knowledge & blessings of Nath Sect. These procedures are open for all irrespective of cast, creed, and religion. These are used to get rid of the defects like personality problems, adverse planetary position, Horoscope issues, and â€œVastu doshâ€, Critical diseases, enemy problems, unnatural death, etc. These procedures develop interpersonal relationships resulting in increased working efficiencies, progressing the persons in their worldly, financial and spiritual life. One starts enjoying mental stability, life stability, peace and happiness. Cow Shelter To provide all services to the Cow and take advantages of â€œGaushalaâ€.

detailsOfAchievement: Pankhudi Foundation started in 2005 as an informal group from IIT Mumbai by Shahzad Akhtar Wakeel, an IITB alumnus. The whole group was motivated to uplift the condition of underprivileged children of our society. Over the last 11 years we have developed sustainable projects which are catering to under-privileged children in the areas of Education, Healthcare and life skills. We are taking care of slum children, visually impaired children, girl education across different cities in India.[ Pune, Mumbai, Delhi, Patna, Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad]. We have positively touched over 6000 children since we have started. Apart from teaching, we are also involved in collection drives of so many things for the needy children. We keep providing relief works and materials during the time of natural disasters in the affected areas.[Bihar Floods2008, LEH cloudburst, Nepal Earthquake 2015, Chennai floods 2015 to name a few] Going forward, we have plans to strengthen our existing projects and also come up with an adoption promotion drive. Though adoption laws are strict in India, we believe that genuine family who wants to adopt a genuine needy child should get connected easily. With your support and blessings, we are continuously trying to work on this issue. Please visit www.pankhudifoundation.org to know more about us and our ongoing activities.
